question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: I vilken del av Iberiska halvön ligger Teruel, Spanien?
answer: Teruel ligger i den östra delen av den Iberiska halvön, i regionen Aragonien i Spanien.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the eastern part of the Iberian Peninsula, in the Aragon region of Spain.
